title: globorisk: Global CVD Risk Calculator
text: globorisk package calculates risk estimates cardiovascular disease R using Globorisk. Globorisk cardiovascular disease risk score predicts risk heart attack stroke healthy individuals (yet heart attack stroke) 182 countries. uses information person’s country residence, age, sex, smoking, diabetes, blood pressure cholesterol predict chance heart attack stroke next 10 years. person recent diabetes cholesterol test, can use office-based version Globorisk based body weight height instead.

title: globorisk: Global CVD Risk Calculator
code: library(globorisk)  # estimate 10-year risk of CVD using laboratory calculator  globorisk(   sex = 1,   age = 52,   sbp = 140,   tc = 4.5,   dm = 1,   smk = 0,   iso = "ZAF",   year = 2020,   version = "lab",   type = "risk" )  # estimate 10-year survival using laboratory calculator  globorisk(   sex = 1,   age = 52,   sbp = 140,   tc = 4.5,   dm = 1,   smk = 0,   iso = "ZAF",   year = 2020,   version = "lab",   type = "survival" )  # estimate 10-year risk of CVD using office calculator  globorisk(   sex = 1,   age = 52,   sbp = 140,   smk = 0,   bmi = 28,   iso = "ZAF",   year = 2020,   version = "office",   type = "risk" )  # also works on vectors globorisk(   sex = c(1, 0, 0),   age = c(52, 60, 65),   sbp = c(140, 160, 170),   smk = c(0, 1, 1),   bmi = c(20, 30, 40),   iso = c("AFG", "AFG", "USA"),   year = c(2000, 2000, 2020),   version = "office",   type = "risk" )
